append.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to add something to a piece of writing
append.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The results of the client survey are appended to this document.
append.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to attach or add something to a piece of writing
append.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: I have appended a letter which you sent to us last year.
The director has the right to append comments to the final report.
